content.text:
Let me analyze the target structures and provide assembly instructions for both constructions shown in the main image.

Structure 1 (Left tower):
- A vertical stack with 6 blocks
- Base and top are green horizontal blocks
- Middle section has yellow vertical block on left side
- Center has red, blue, red blocks stacked vertically

Structure 2 (Right side):
- An arch-like structure
- Two orange cylindrical pillars
- Green horizontal block on top

Let me provide the assembly steps for both structures:

For Structure 1 (Left tower):
{
    Step1: Move block with index 5 (bottom green horizontal)
    Step2: Move block with index 10 (yellow vertical)
    Step3: Move block with index 3 (red cube)
    Step4: Move block with index 1 (blue cube)
    Step5: Move block with index 3 (red cube)
    Step6: Move block with index 5 (top green horizontal)
}

For Structure 2 (Arch):
{
    Step1: Move block with index 14 (left orange cylinder)
    Step2: Move block with index 14 (right orange cylinder)
    Step3: Move block with index 5 (green horizontal block)
}

The blocks used maintain their exact orientations as shown in the dictionary, and no rotations were needed. Each structure can be built independently of the other.
